storyInfo: The Gendarmerie and the students all start to hallucinate. The scholar turns out to be a remnant of the Witch King, and Lessing charges into the chamber to protect Ebenholz. Federico finds Arturia, only to discover she is not responsible for the chaos. Her target is the Gesatzswächter.

attributes.content: A standoff.

It was meant to be a sudden assault. The casters of Kreis Heldenschwert would disguise themselves as musicians and infiltrated the Witch King's Spire, while the armies from Erdenherre and Sturmland would stay hidden outside through their enchantments.
No one dared underestimate the Witch King's power, but the battle was nonetheless harder than anyone could have imagined.
The army outside the Spire was discovered by the Einwald Imperial Guard. The first wave of casters all died at its base, while the second wave was swallowed by the endless staircase.
The only ones who made it to the throne were the Twins. Grimmacht, and her sister, Ewigegnade.
Black and red had always been the Urtica colors, but from the entrance to its deepest innards, the Spire was almost completely void of black tiles.
House Urtica's secret chamber lies underground, and it's very close to Sonata Spire, so we can make our way down through it. Herr Fremont has already left, and we must catch up.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Nein.
attributes.name: Gesatzswächter

attributes.content: Is something the matter?
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Go no further.
attributes.name: Gesatzswächter

attributes.content: The Witch King's Imperial Guard is here. You will die.
attributes.name: Gesatzswächter

attributes.content: The Imperial Guard? What do you mean?
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: The folks from Heldenschwert never expected you people to win. They simply wanted the Sturmland armies to keep the Imperial Guard at bay while the Twins climbed the spire.
attributes.name: Gesatzswächter

attributes.content: In their plans, all of you were meant to die. The Witch King, the Twins, everyone.
attributes.name: Gesatzswächter

attributes.content: Tell your father and Ernst that the Hochbergs should not be buried here, not in this spire.
attributes.name: Gesatzswächter

attributes.content: Herr Reiner, my father is dead.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: I'm the reason that you're the only survivor.
attributes.name: Gesatzswächter

attributes.content: I'm the one... who took away your freedom...
attributes.name: Gesatzswächter

attributes.content: Please, look at me. I'm Viviana.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Did you perhaps... mistake me for my father?
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Leave now. Leave Ludwigs-Universität.
attributes.name: Gesatzswächter

attributes.content: Grimmacht's envoy has passed on the Kaiserin's order. As an Empresses' Voice, you have more than enough grounds to terminate your mission.
attributes.name: Gesatzswächter

attributes.content: And to prevent the Voices from going out of sync, Ewigegnade won't punish you for it either.
attributes.name: Gesatzswächter

attributes.content: Do you hear the commotion around us?
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: It sounds familiar.
attributes.name: Gesatzswächter

attributes.content: This is practically a battlefield. My duties prevent me from escorting you out, but I can at least use my melody to forge a path through the chaos for you.
attributes.name: Gesatzswächter

attributes.content: ...Nein.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: I will never forget how quiet and peaceful it was when we entered the campus. The young students' faces still had hope for what was to come.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: I can't let them become sacrifices to this conflict.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: While I'm nowhere near as strong as you or Herr Fremont, I'd like to help as many of those weaker than me as I can.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Herkunftshorn's secret lies ahead.
attributes.name: Gesatzswächter

attributes.content: Ewigegnade said that when Das Kaiserinnensfest comes to an end, you'll have another chance to choose.
attributes.name: Gesatzswächter

attributes.content: But once you've gazed upon the country's darkest, most hidden secret, all your other choices will immediately evaporate.
attributes.name: Gesatzswächter

attributes.content: I expected as much.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: But while I long for freedom, I can't very well turn my back on people suffering right in front of me.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Ironic, isn't it?
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: ...You're just like your father.
attributes.name: Gesatzswächter

attributes.content: Ja, I know.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: I've... always known the kind of man he was.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: What's going on? Why are there so many people underground?
attributes.name: Gendarmerie A

attributes.content: They charged inside! It's not just Sonata Spire, either; The Scholars' Spire next door, too! There are students everywhere!
attributes.name: Gendarmerie B

attributes.content: Stop them all! Don't let them block the stairs, or we can't chase—
attributes.name: Gendarmerie A

attributes.content: Who did that?
attributes.name: Gendarmerie A

attributes.content: No idea, there's too much going on! I can't make anything out!
attributes.name: Gendarmerie B

attributes.content: W-Witch King's remnants!
attributes.name: Gendarmerie A

attributes.content: Listen.
attributes.name: 'Witch King's Echo'

attributes.content: Listen to the extreme chaos, as well as to the only melody that can be found within it.
attributes.name: 'Witch King's Echo'

attributes.content: That is Herkunftshorn's sigh.
attributes.name: 'Witch King's Echo'

attributes.content: The final sound our king left upon this land.
attributes.name: 'Witch King's Echo'

attributes.content: The supreme spire, whose dark shadow on the ground causes all to shudder.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Those who do not wish to be engulfed in darkness paddle their arms and climb the staircases leading up.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: The pitch black will hangs over the throne in silence, awaiting inquiries from other souls.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Those who hide behind the curtains regret the demise of love.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Those who lead the charge in others' stead ponder the meaning of heroism.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Those who wade through the sea of their fallen comrades' blood lament the price of their sacrifice.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: All of them now gather at the far ends of this spiral staircase, to witness the birth of this melody.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Its name—
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: —Der Tod des Hexenkönigs.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: It's the Witch King's army! They're charging toward me!
attributes.name: Frightened Student

attributes.content: Casters pouring in through Catastrophes! Originium piercing entire cities!
attributes.name: Frightened Student

attributes.content: Help, I don't want to die... But... I might as well. Please, burn me to ashes! I don't want to be crumpled into a living ball of flesh!
attributes.name: Frightened Student

attributes.content: Urk... Nngh!
attributes.name: Frightened Student

attributes.content: How could you set yourself ablaze, you idiot!
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: Nein, everyone here has gone mad!
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: This sound... Th-The pipe organ! Are the Witch King's remnants performing? All of us are under the influence of their... illusions...
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: Who's there on the podium?
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: All this blood, all these... corpses? But who is it lying in the blood...?
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: Grimmacht... Ewigegnade!
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: Hahaha, it's you! The wicked Twins!
attributes.name: Enraged Student

attributes.content: The rumors were true, weren't they? Your souls were cooked up by Sarkaz Arts, and your blood molded from the ambitions of traitors!
attributes.name: Enraged Student

attributes.content: You killed Leithanien's true king, and took over her throne—
attributes.name: Enraged Student

attributes.content: You two were born to destroy this country!
attributes.name: Enraged Student

attributes.content: You're wrong!
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: Grimmacht may be cruel, but she's not evil!
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: And who are you? Another Empresses' Voice? A puppet carrying out the Twins' will?
attributes.name: Enraged Student

attributes.content: Nein, she wouldn't let me become one.
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: But I'm alive because of Grimmacht. I want to help her. I want to—
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: Anyone who accepts a monster's reward becomes a monster themselves. Look at all this! Look at how far Leithanien has fallen because of you people!
attributes.name: Enraged Student

attributes.content: This spire... This school...
attributes.name: Enraged Student

attributes.content: Did you keep Ludwigs-Universität around only to impersonate us true Leithanians? To pretend you still had the decency to respect tradition?
attributes.name: Enraged Student

attributes.content: I've had enough. I'm sick of the Empresses' Voice showing up at our lectures. I'm sick of the salons incapable of anything other but empty praise!
attributes.name: Enraged Student

attributes.content: Our history, our knowledge, and our arts are all long dead. Murdered!
attributes.name: Enraged Student

attributes.content: So we may as well die together.
attributes.name: Enraged Student

attributes.content: I... I'll kill all of you...!
attributes.name: Enraged Student

attributes.content: Ugh—!
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: What are these Arts? Why can't I block them?
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: No... Is that a fist? I...
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: Michael's eyes suddenly widen.
More and more people rush toward Sonata Spire by the minute, joining the fray as the music continues. Many of them set down their wands, choosing instead of use their fists, legs, and teeth.
Is this still the Leithanien he knows?
All the rhetorical tricks and combat tactics he learned... even Originium Arts have lost their effectiveness.
Aside from cowering under his shield, there is nothing he can do. Right now, he is no different from the young boy he was when he had just left his hometown and arrived in Zwillingstürme.
Please, I beg you... Ewigegnade, I'll do anything... Please spare me...
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: No... Don't hurt me...
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: Grimmacht... Grimmacht...
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: Please stand.
Who...?
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: Raise your shield, and face it to your left.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: ...Okay.
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: Help me hold this person up.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: A Gendarme? Who is he?
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: I do not know his name, but he is one of Loris Bordin's subordinates.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: He was attempting to blow my head up with Arts.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: And you still saved him?
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: Ugh—!
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: The third sculpture, shattered.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: He was merely carrying out his duties. I see no reason to harm him.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: These men may be under the influence of Arts, losing their reason to their most intense emotions buried deep within their hearts.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Fighting them would be inefficient. I suggest instead quickly rendering them unconscious, as I have been doing.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: ...So this entire time, you've been knocking people out while making your way through the crowd?
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: I have also attempted to place them in a corner to ensure that they won't be stepped on or struck in the melee.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Danke, then, for not clubbing me the moment you saw me then.
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: I do not require thanks.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Micha Wolf, you may be young, but mentally you are much stronger than most adults.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: I believe that as long as someone is available to provide you a hint, you will never lose yourself to these illusions.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: That is not necessarily the case for everyone else.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Although I have yet to receive confirmation, if it was Arturia's music that caused this chaos, then the abnormal behavior will continue until we end her performance.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: I'll leave this place to you, Micha Wolf.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Call me Michael.
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: I must continue ascending, Michael.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: This sound is very familiar.
attributes.name: Strange Voice From a Sculpture

attributes.content: The staircase outside must be as chaotic as it was twenty-three years ago?
attributes.name: Strange Voice From a Sculpture

attributes.content: Panic, anxiety, fear, rage... All these emotions, caused by that non-existent spire.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: The Genesis Spire standing at the heart of Leithanien.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: When its sound can once again be heard far and wide, what sort of music will it finally have in store for us?
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Herkunftshorn, our one and only king!
attributes.name: 'Witch King's Echo'

attributes.content: Your magnificence props up the Spire, and your radiance shrouds the land!
attributes.name: 'Witch King's Echo'

attributes.content: Your soul shines eternal, and your Arts will never fade!
attributes.name: 'Witch King's Echo'

attributes.content: All of Leithanien's wisdom and elegance gather before you!
attributes.name: 'Witch King's Echo'

attributes.content: Your luminance and greatness are the pillars of her success!
attributes.name: 'Witch King's Echo'

attributes.content: Lift your heads, all ye who prostrate on the land before him—
attributes.name: 'Witch King's Echo'

attributes.content: Gaze upon our king's accomplishments! His glory!
attributes.name: 'Witch King's Echo'

attributes.content: At last... The day has finally arrived.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: For two decades, I've dreamt of walking up those long stairs and standing before this very throne.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: Fortunately, fate provided me the enchantments you left on the Güldenesgesatz.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: Today, very soon, your final melody will be performed.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: Herkunftshorn, Leithanien's most supreme ruler.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: Allow me to once again seek an audience.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: Allow me to... seek your forgiveness.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: Good boy, Franz.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: I apologize. I had no choice but to knock you out. Does your head still hurt?
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: I would have thought you'd have plenty of questions for me.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: ...Hah.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Ja, that's the look. You're in pain, but unwilling to give in. Even lying in sludge, you'd still look upon your betters with scorn.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: My betters? All I see is a flock of madmen putting on a show.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Your ramblings are even less worth listening to than the noise in my head.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: You believe us insane, and that we've mistaken you for the Witch King. And so we repent and kneel before you.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: What a shame. Even I had hoped that you could truly become him.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: If only... If only our original experiment had succeeded. If only we'd found the way to perform the Voice of Mundane right from the start.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: Then, neither you nor the other children would have suffered so.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: ...It was you?
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: And to think I was going to... protect you...
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Ha... hahahaha!
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: You're coughing up blood.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: *spit*
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: I almost wish my blood really were imbued with evil power. Then I could've at least burnt away that deceitful mask you're wearing.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: But I haven't told you a single lie.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: When we first met, you'd yet to learn to walk. All you could do was sit on your mother's lap.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: Was she also...?
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: A remnant of the Witch King? Is that what you wanted to ask?
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: Are you worried that your birth itself was... some sort of evil ritual?
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: Nein, quite the opposite. But you wish it were, don't you? You want your entire life to have been a conspiracy, through-and-through. That way, you'd feel comfortable despising it.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: But that doesn't make sense, my dear Franz.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: Your mother was a respectable woman. She was a descendant of the Urticas, part of the Witch King's bloodline. So to others, she was almost by definition one of his remnants.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: Before she died, she entrusted you to a friend, an old servant of the Witch King. And to protect you, he too was killed by the Empresses' Voice.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: Would you scorn them as well? Even though they truly loved you?
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: ...So after taking away my love, now you tell me I don't deserve to hate either?
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: You want me to be nothing more than an empty husk. All the better to squeeze that old fart into me.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Hah... Just try.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: The Witch King's whispers, his robes, his crown... What else is there?
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Don't worry, my child.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: When Herkunftshorn's power arrives, he will end your cruel fate and heal you of your scars and pain.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: I thought I told you to let him go.
So you chased us after all.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: It must have been hard to make it past all the enchantments outside, no?
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: This is my responsibility, and I don't give up.
attributes.name: Lessing

attributes.content: I'm surprised you were able to cleave through my defensive enchantments.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: I sharpen my sword with my Arts every day. I make sure that it's as solid as my will.
attributes.name: Lessing

attributes.content: Your sword... It has a special enchantment that specifically targets traditional Leithanian Arts. Did the Professor teach you that? Has he always been prepared to make an enemy of Leithanien?
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: The old man's never been one to pick his enemies. And neither do I. Our enemies crawl out the shadows on their own.
attributes.name: Lessing

attributes.content: Just like you, Gerhard.
attributes.name: Lessing

attributes.content: I never expected to point my sword at someone who was once my ally.
attributes.name: Lessing

attributes.content: We don't have to be enemies, Lessing.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: The Maeyers have served the Urticas for generations.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: As long as you're willing to stand on our side and help Franz, there will always be a place for you by the throne.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: The throne?
attributes.name: Lessing

attributes.content: All I see is a musty old chair.
attributes.name: Lessing

attributes.content: My grandfather, my parents... All of them have been held hostage by that chair for far too long.
attributes.name: Lessing

attributes.content: Why should I repeat the same mistake and bind myself to it again?
attributes.name: Lessing

attributes.content: Hm, well said.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: Those unwilling to be bound by the past will always try to seek out a different fate.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: Like you, and like me.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: The Concertmaster has started the performance.
attributes.name: 'Witch King's Echo'

attributes.content: It's almost time.
attributes.name: 'Witch King's Echo'

attributes.content: No one can stop the advent of Herkunftshorn anymore.
attributes.name: 'Witch King's Echo'

attributes.content: But Herkunftshorn isn't the one sitting on that throne.
attributes.name: Lessing

attributes.content: His name is Ebenholz.
attributes.name: Lessing

attributes.content: And it's my duty to bring him back with me.
attributes.name: Lessing

attributes.content: As long as I live, nothing will stop me from reaching that battered chair.
attributes.name: Lessing

attributes.content: It doesn't matter how many men you have—
attributes.name: Lessing

attributes.content: Come at me.
attributes.name: Lessing

attributes.content: Gesatzswächter...!
attributes.name: 'Witch King's Echo'

attributes.content: The melody has begun. Not even you can stop its flow!
attributes.name: 'Witch King's Echo'

attributes.content: Perhaps not.
attributes.name: Gesatzswächter

attributes.content: Your sword is... reverberating?
attributes.name: 'Witch King's Echo'

attributes.content: It's useless, Gesatzswächter. You may be able to chain down a single man's mind, but a hundred? A thousand? Your melody will be drowned in chaos.
attributes.name: 'Witch King's Echo'

attributes.content: Much like how the Gesatzswächter were unable to stop the melee at the foot of the Witch King's Spire twenty-three years ago...
attributes.name: 'Witch King's Echo'

attributes.content: If so, I will kill chaos itself.
attributes.name: Gesatzswächter

attributes.content: His longsword pierces not his enemy's chest, but instead the ground beneath them.
A golden radiance surges from the blade, drowning out even the Gesatzswächter's armor, then dashes toward the sky to form a webbing the color of the setting sun, enveloping Sonata Spire within it.
All sounds within reach of his Arts are drowned out, leaving nothing but the solemn melody reverberating in the air.
A golden curtain?
attributes.name: 'Witch King's Echo'

attributes.content: Those Arts should take at least ten Gesatzswächter to cast! How did you manage it all on your own?!
attributes.name: 'Witch King's Echo'

attributes.content: I... ugh!
attributes.name: 'Witch King's Echo'

attributes.content: The harmony of the Güldenesgesatz is inviolable.
attributes.name: Gesatzswächter

attributes.content: Today, no one outside Ludwigs-Universität will hear a single discordant note.
attributes.name: Gesatzswächter

attributes.content: I swear by my flesh, blood, and soul—
attributes.name: Gesatzswächter

attributes.content: Not a single remnant of the Witch King will leave this spire alive. You and your Arts must be extinguished here.
attributes.name: Gesatzswächter

attributes.content: The melody's changed again.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: Gerhard.
attributes.name: Fremont

attributes.content: Took you long enough, Professor.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: I'm sure killing us Leithanian casters would be a simple matter for you.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: But as always, you're unwilling to dirty your own hands.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: How many times do I have to tell you? Us Liches are just the keepers of the palace of knowledge.
attributes.name: Fremont

attributes.content: We bring our wisdom to the different races to advance the development of Arts, but we never interfere with a country's own affairs. That was the Court of the Lich King's contract with your ancestors, and it is the Liches' creed.
attributes.name: Fremont

attributes.content: I understand all too well. A group of Sarkaz living in Leithanien's most ancient spire, the seat of her power—No Leithanian would willingly accept that truth.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: I'm quite jealous of you, you know. Even against Herkunftshorn, all you did was provide the enchantment that molded those twins.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: You didn't need to bear the responsibility of changing history, nor did you stain your hands with... the blood of your closest friend.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: I don't get what you're thinking at all. Years ago, you're the one tried to convince me to stop Herkunftshorn, but now you're mingling with these third-rate wannabes!
attributes.name: Fremont

attributes.content: Ja, because I changed. And you're the one who changed me.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: You had me research the Güldenesgesatz and think on Leithanien's history. And I did exactly as you asked.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: But the deeper I got into my research, the more I... despaired.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: Herkunftshorn's accomplishments were simply too dazzling.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: He resolved the Siracusan problem and saved Leithanien when it was on the verge of breaking apart. He crushed Corsica I and prevented us from becoming a Gaulish vassal state.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: Only through his presence have we thwarted every existential threat to the country, again and again.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: We had such a great man on the throne, and... we killed him.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: When did I ever tell you to read up on how great Herkunftshorn was?
attributes.name: Fremont

attributes.content: Besides, what does his 'greatness' have to do with him killing so many Sarkaz and Leithanians alike, turning the country into a smoking hot mess, and plugging his ears to anyone else's opinions?
attributes.name: Fremont

attributes.content: I had you study the Güldenesgesatz because I wanted you to have a more open-minded outlook. Not to pour over every trivial growing pain every nation goes through. Hardships happen, then everyone goes back to their lives.
attributes.name: Fremont

attributes.content: But somehow you ended up caught up in this nonsense. How can you even consider this when so many have died?
attributes.name: Fremont

attributes.content: ...Because I can't see them, Professor.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: I'm not like you, a Sarkaz with control over even death itself. When we die, that's it. We become a speck of dust on this land forever. The dead can never feel my hatred.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: All those years ago, I was the one who persuaded them to fight. I sent them to their deaths in the Witch King's spire. If that battle had never happened, he wouldn't have died, and neither would they.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: You idiot. And that's why you want to resurrect him?
attributes.name: Fremont

attributes.content: You can't possibly think that, when you do see him, he's going to praise you for this? Or even comfort you? He wasn't some kindly old grandfather who sang nursery rhymes to dumb kids!
attributes.name: Fremont

attributes.content: He wouldn't even spare you a glance. He'd treat you as a speck of dust dirtying his floor.
attributes.name: Fremont

attributes.content: Ha... Haha... You still don't understand a thing.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: A selfish and cowardly man like me...
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: Everything I do... I do to seek my own forgiveness.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: That thing you're holding... The missing Güldenesgesatz?!
attributes.name: Fremont

attributes.content: More precisely, it's the lingering trace of Herkunftshorn's power he left in the Güldenesgesatz.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: You want to use his Arts by force? Don't be stupid, Gerhard! You can't do it!
attributes.name: Fremont

attributes.content: I've come too far not to.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: I don't want... to regret this a second time.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: A flame rises, so black and so red that it seems drenched in blood.
The walls of the chamber tremble violently. Originium crystals sprout and grow from every crevice between the brick and tile, even piercing the ground's foundation.
Ugh... Argh...
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Ebenholz!
attributes.name: Lessing

attributes.content: Hurry, Gerhard's going to destroy this whole school!
attributes.name: Lessing

attributes.content: Witch... King...
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: The Voice of Mundane... It's boiling in my head. It... It'll be free soon...
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: That's not the Voice of Mundane reacting.
attributes.name: Lessing

attributes.content: It's... not?
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: I don't know who first got it wrong. Or maybe Gerhard has given up on summoning him through you entirely.
attributes.name: Lessing

attributes.content: But Herkunftshorn's power isn't originating from your mind. You aren't the key melody here!
attributes.name: Lessing

attributes.content: Arturia.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: You're a little later than expected.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Is it because you were helping the Gendarmerie? You've grown soft. What happened to the executor who would stop at nothing to fulfill his mission?
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: The fourth sculpture.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: You aren't playing.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: You must be shocked, aren't you?
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Like I've told you, you don't need to rush to find me. Until my real audience arrives, I'm just a listener myself.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: You aren't the source of the illusions the men below are experiencing.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: I'm a little hurt. We've been competing against each other for how long now? But you still confuse the 'truth' my music draws out with the 'illusions' a conman would use.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Besides, haven't you noticed? The people trapped in this spire have always hated each other. They've never stopped fighting.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Isn't laying the blame for this chaos entirely on mind-affecting Arts also a form of running away?
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Leithanien's affairs are not within the purview of the Notarial Hall. My primary targets are limited to you and your accomplices.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Who is manipulating the sculptures to protect you?
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: An avid listener of mine.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: You arrived a bit too late. Just a little earlier and you could also have had a front row seat to Der Tod des Hexenkönigs.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: The fifth.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Arturia, I'm well acquainted with every crime you have committed. Your Arts have affected a variety of regions and social classes, but you have never actively participated in political conflict.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Do you remember my mother's funeral?
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: How I freed the emotions everyone had kept hidden in their hearts. It was the first time I realized how easily others fell into my melodies.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: But that brought me no joy. Quite the opposite. I was disappointed.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Powerful emotions should give rise to more than just chaos. Emotions are meant to bolster our souls, to allow us to overcome any obstacle... even our predestined extinction.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Which is why I came here in my search.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: The sixth.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: If you're looking to perform for the Witch King, then you will never succeed. He perished long ago. Your melody has no effect on the dead.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: It would seem you're a little mistaken about this performance.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: The shadow over the throne was dispersed, and the twin heroes walked out of the spire to the adoration of the masses... While those who stayed put are still waist deep in the emotions they felt when they witnessed the mountain crumble before them.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Der Tod des Hexenkönigs isn't about the Witch King. He was never the main character of this piece.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: What happened... Why are we here? Ugh, my hand hurts! Why am I bleeding?
attributes.name: Flustered Student

attributes.content: The stairs are shaking! Is the spire coming down? What's with the black fire burning from the ground... Help! Help!
attributes.name: Anxious Student

attributes.content: These are Herkunftshorn's enchantments. You've all come to your senses... We need to get out of the spire, now!
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: Ngh... guh...
attributes.name: Gendarmerie C

attributes.content: You're awake too?
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: Candlelight... Candle... Can...
attributes.name: Gendarmerie C

attributes.content: Candlelight?
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: Here, this way.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: But the flames... The whole Sonata Spire is enveloped by these black flames!
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: I'll open up a path.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: With your candle's flame?
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: Pay attention to the shadow it casts on the wall.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: The shadow's... tearing the black flames apart?
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: Ja... This is the true form of my Arts.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: You must be disappointed. They're not nearly as beautiful as you thought, right?
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: No, meine Dame... This is stunning.
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: You don't often see Arts that can rival Herkunftshorn's undying black flames.
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: I can't defeat them.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: But as long as something truly exists, it casts a shadow. The most I can manage is make use of this principle to ever-so-briefly create a chance to survive.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Is something the matter?
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: I was just thinking that... I was your enemy until a moment ago, yet you aren't blaming me.
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: Why should I?
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: You said you're not an Empresses' Voice. And I have yet to formally enter the Kaiserin's Spire myself.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Here, you can just be you, and I can just be Viviana. We aren't carrying out the Kaiserin's orders. We're simply helping out the poor souls struggling in this music.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: So please take the students and make your way out as fast as you can, while they've recovered their mobility. I can still hold on a little longer.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: I can see golden light outside. The Gesatzswächter's curtain has already enveloped this place. He could destroy the spire at any moment.
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: I trust that Herr Reiner will make the appropriate decision.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: What about you, then?
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: My candleflame will extinguish sooner or later. Hopefully, it chooses the most meaningful moment to.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Frau Hochberg... Viviana!
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: Go, Michael.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Please take care of yourself and these young students. Each of you has a future that... someone like me could never dream of.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: This is the place.
attributes.name: Imperial Caster

attributes.content: Surround the spire.
attributes.name: Imperial Caster

attributes.content: Casters from the Kaiserinnen's Spires?
attributes.name: Gesatzswächter

attributes.content: That's right, Brandt.
attributes.name: Cora

attributes.content: Haven't I already said that—
attributes.name: Gesatzswächter

attributes.content: These are the Kaiserin's orders.
attributes.name: Cora

attributes.content: We are to assist you in resolving the problem here.
attributes.name: Imperial Caster

attributes.content: Good. Use your Arts. Join me as an accompaniment.
attributes.name: Gesatzswächter

attributes.content: I will tighten the curtain.
attributes.name: Gesatzswächter

attributes.content: No, Herr Reiner!
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: Step aside, envoy of Grimmacht.
attributes.name: Gesatzswächter

attributes.content: Will you continue to stand in our way? Your earlier behavior alone is reason enough to suspect you of colluding with the Witch King's remnants.
attributes.name: Gesatzswächter

attributes.content: There are still innocents inside.
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: I see the students have all been evacuated, and Herr Fremont wouldn't die so easily.
attributes.name: Gesatzswächter

attributes.content: But the Sankta, and Viviana...
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: Viviana is still inside?
attributes.name: Cora

attributes.content: She's trapped by the black flames, and stayed behind to save me and the students.
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: Brandt!
attributes.name: Cora

attributes.content: This is our best chance to eliminate the threat.
attributes.name: Gesatzswächter

attributes.content: Once the ensemble is complete, your strength will completely annihilate the spire! Viviana will perish too!
attributes.name: Cora

attributes.content: It was her decision to enter the battlefield.
attributes.name: Gesatzswächter

attributes.content: Werner gave his life for Leithanien. We can't let his one and only daughter follow in his footsteps!
attributes.name: Cora

attributes.content: You promised Werner that you'd save her. We both did. Have you forgotten your oath?
attributes.name: Cora

attributes.content: Have you forgotten your oath, Reiner?
attributes.name: 'Gesatzswächter'

attributes.content: The blade and Arts of a Gesatzswächter belong only to the Güldenesgesatz and to Leithanien.
attributes.name: 'Gesatzswächter'

attributes.content: It doesn't matter how Herkunftshorn treats his subjects. He is Leithanien's rightful ruler, as recognized by the Güldenesgesatz.
attributes.name: 'Gesatzswächter'

attributes.content: If you choose to fight alongside House Hochberg, you will be abandoning your duties as a Gesatzswächter.
attributes.name: 'Gesatzswächter'

attributes.content: One more step, and you will be making an enemy out of all of us.
attributes.name: 'Gesatzswächter'

attributes.content: Brandt... Why didn't you come save us?
attributes.name: 'Hochberg'

attributes.content: We grew up together. We were like brothers.
attributes.name: 'Hochberg'

attributes.content: I know you loathe the Witch King too. You despise his tyranny over Sturmland's citizens, and you hate how he turned our homeland into a battlefield and a testing ground!
attributes.name: 'Hochberg'

attributes.content: The Battle of the Four Emperors was years ago, and the skies above Sturmland are still filled with Catastrophe clouds formed by Originium shards. Many of our children are doomed to be born with those accursed stones.
attributes.name: 'Hochberg'

attributes.content: Why can't we resist? Why can't we make him pay the price?
attributes.name: 'Hochberg'

attributes.content: Is it because the Güldenesgesatz dictates that he's the ruler, and that we are his attendants?
attributes.name: 'Hochberg'

attributes.content: Nein! It isn't right for us to be born that way.
attributes.name: 'Hochberg'

attributes.content: If your power is merely dependent on some inviolable will, does that make your will—the Gesatzswächter's will—fundamentally a lie?
attributes.name: 'Hochberg'

attributes.content: It's that lie that's forcing you run away from your decision.
attributes.name: 'Hochberg'

attributes.content: As well as from your remorse toward the dead Hochbergs.
attributes.name: 'Hochberg'

attributes.content: ...Viviana.
attributes.name: Gesatzswächter

attributes.content: His body wobbles once, almost unnoticeably.
Then, small cracks start appearing in the golden curtain.
Resonance.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: At last... I got you.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: The seventh.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: All the sculptures have been destroyed. You no longer have a means to resist.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Just a moment longer, my dear Federico.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Do you hear that?
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Brandt Reiner. His soul is finally opening up to my melody.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: His strong will has finally broken free of his restraints, and the surge of emotions will lead him to make the decision he will regret the least.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: This is what I've been waiting for... The truest climax of this piece.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: A melody, so impassioned that it approaches piercing, rings out from the strings of Arturia's cello.
As though motivated by the music, black Originium flames rise from the deepest depths of the earth and tear asunder the surface mere inches away.
The Witch King's musicians standing guard at the foot of the spire all walk single file into the black flames, chanting even as they are incinerated into ash.
The very Spire that holds up the skies, the inevitable, indispensable, and eternal pillar—
attributes.name: 'Witch King's Echo'

attributes.content: Now rise!
attributes.name: 'Witch King's Echo'

attributes.content: Something bores out of the earth's flesh.
It is a high spire.
It bears a red tint to its blackness, a spiral shape, and a strange sharpness.
The long lost Witch King's Spire stands atop the land once more.
